scenario.name: new_script
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[$fake_port];branch=[branch] From: "Тест 420 response" <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[call_number] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
